TableField.name: LossEmpPracticeID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track employment practices resulting in loss

ForeignField.name: EventDate
ForeignField.phrase: Event Date|Date the situation or incident occurred

ForeignField.name: IncidentReport
ForeignField.phrase: Incident Reported|A description of the incident reported based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Incident Reports module

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization of the lossee and person accountable for the mitigation of this loss and control of future losses

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization of the lossee and person accountable for the mitigation of this loss and control of future losses

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this claim and mitigating the associated loss

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this incident and mitigating the associated loss

TableField.name: ShiftID
TableField.phrase: Shift|The shift during which the employment practice occurred

CodeField.name: Shift
CodeField.phrase: Shift|The shift during which the employment practice occurred

TableField.name: PracticeTypeID
TableField.phrase: Practice Type|The specific type of employment practice violation asserted within this claim of loss

CodeField.name: PracticeType
CodeField.phrase: Practice Type|The specific type of employment practice violation asserted within this claim of loss

RemoteField.name: ComplainantID
RemoteField.phrase: Complainant|The name of the individual filing a complaint in association with the employment practice

ForeignField.name: Complainant
ForeignField.phrase: Complainant|The name of the individual filing a complaint in association with the employment practice

RemoteField.name: SupervisorID
RemoteField.phrase: Supervisor|The name of the supervisor of the complainant at the time of the alleged employment practice

ForeignField.name: Supervisor
ForeignField.phrase: Supervisor|The name of the supervisor of the complainant at the time of the alleged employment practice

TableField.name: Assertions
TableField.phrase: Assertions|A detailed description of the emplyment practice and associated loss
TableField.sample: Jane claimed that Larry Hansen subject her of being as bad at softwball as she was at her job. Doe alledges that Hansen repeatedly belittled her in front of her coworkers and threatened to fire her if she couldn't get a base hit. Jane believed that a slide used in Hansen's last presentation was intended to humiliate her in front of her peers.

TableField.name: DesiredOutcome
TableField.phrase: Desired Outcome|A detailed description of the subject's desired outcome following a supporting investigation
TableField.sample: Mr. Hansen should be repremanded and a letter be inserted into his personnel file warning him about harrassing subordinates.

RemoteField.name: IncidentReportID
RemoteField.phrase: Incident Report|A description of the incident reported based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Incident Reports module

RemoteField.name: ClaimID
RemoteField.phrase: Claim ID|The record ID field of the Claims module

RemoteField.name: ReportDate
RemoteField.phrase: Report Date|Date the loss was reported

RemoteField.name: ClaimDate
RemoteField.phrase: Claim Date|Date the claim was officially submitted to an insurance carrier or third party administrator

RemoteField.name: ClosureDate
RemoteField.phrase: Claim Closure Date|The date the claim was closed

RemoteField.name: TimeDeterminable
RemoteField.phrase: Time Determinable?|Whether the time the loss occurred is determinable

RemoteField.name: IncurredTime
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred Date|Date the employment practice loss was incurred

RemoteField.name: LocationID
RemoteField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the employment practice loss occurred

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific location within the facility where the employment practice loss occurred

RemoteField.name: LossLegitimacyTypeID
RemoteField.phrase: Legitimacy Type|A combined field used to describe the legitimacy type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LegitimacyCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group claims of similar loss legitimacy

CodeField.name: LegitimacyCategory
CodeField.phrase: Legitimacy Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group claims of similar loss legitimacy

ForeignField.name: LegitimacyDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Description|A brief, but detailed, description of the legitimacy type
ForeignField.sample: Any loss claim that results from an indisputable, work-related, injury and the injured person is actively engaged in proactive treatment towards revovery.

ForeignField.name: LossLegitimacyType
ForeignField.phrase: Legitimacy Type|A combined field used to describe the legitimacy type when associating it with other records

RemoteField.name: PersonReportingID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Reporting|The name of the individual that reported the employment practice loss

ForeignField.name: PersonReporting
ForeignField.phrase: Person Reporting|The name of the individual that reported the employment practice loss

RemoteField.name: EntryDate
RemoteField.phrase: Entry Date|Date the loss was first entered into the system

RemoteField.name: SubmittedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Submitted By|The name of the individual that submitted this report into the system

ForeignField.name: SubmittedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Submitted By|The name of the individual that submitted this report into the system

RemoteField.name: PolicyID
RemoteField.phrase: Policy|A description of the insurance policy based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Insurance Policies module

ForeignField.name: InsuranceTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Type|The type of insurance policy associated with the related record

ForeignField.name: InsuranceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

CodeField.name: InsuranceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Insurance Category|A short but descriptive phrase used to group similar insurances

ForeignField.name: InsuranceType
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Type|The type of insurance policy associated with the related record

ForeignField.name: IntegrationKey
ForeignField.phrase: Integration Key|An alpha, numeric, or alphanumeric value assigned by the claims administration company to enable data sharing between the claims administrator and the organization

ForeignField.name: Policy
ForeignField.phrase: Policy|A description of the insurance policy based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Insurance Policies module
ForeignField.sample: General Liability; Chubb; GL-19928-2003; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2003, 03-02-2004

RemoteField.name: ClaimNumber
RemoteField.phrase: Claim Number|A unique number assigned by an insurance company or third party administrator responsible for managing the claim

RemoteField.name: ClaimsAdjusterID
RemoteField.phrase: Claims Adjuster|The individual assigned primary accountability for adjusting this claim and mitigating the associated loss

ForeignField.name: ClaimsAdjuster
ForeignField.phrase: Claims Adjuster|The individual assigned primary accountability for adjusting this claim and mitigating the associated loss

RemoteField.name: LossStatusTypeID
RemoteField.phrase: Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LossStatusCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

CodeField.name: LossStatusCategory
CodeField.phrase: Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

ForeignField.name: LossStatusType
ForeignField.phrase: Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: GeneralLossStatusDescription
ForeignField.phrase: General Status Description|A detailed description of the loss status type
ForeignField.sample: Claims of loss that are open and the claimant is actively seeking treatment and/or engaging the adjuster towards a resolution

RemoteField.name: SpecificLossStatusDescription
RemoteField.phrase: Specific Status Description|A detailed description of the status of the specific claim of loss
RemoteField.sample: The settlement offer is under consideration by the claimant. We offer a settlement every six months and the claimant has indicated a desire to settle the claim this time.

RemoteField.name: OnCoPropID
RemoteField.phrase: On Company Property|This box should be checked if the loss occurred on company property

CodeField.name: OnCoProp
CodeField.phrase: On Company Property|This box should be checked if the loss occurred on company property

RemoteField.name: LocalClaimManagerID
RemoteField.phrase: Local Claim Manager|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this claim and mitigating the associated loss

ForeignField.name: LocalClaimManager
ForeignField.phrase: Local Claim Manager|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this claim and mitigating the associated loss

RemoteField.name: IncurredLocationDesc
RemoteField.phrase: Location Description|A detailed description of the location where the loss occurred

RemoteField.name: IncurredAddress1
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred Address|First physical street address of the location where the employment practice loss occurred

RemoteField.name: IncurredAddress2
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred Address|Second physical street address of the location where the employment practice loss occurred; such as, suite number or p.o. box

RemoteField.name: IncurredCountyID
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred County|A combined field used to track and associate counties

ForeignField.name: IncurredCountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred Country|The name of the country where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredCountry
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred Country|The name of the country where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredStateID
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred State|The name of the state where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredState
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred State|The name of the state where the loss was incurred

ForeignField.name: IncurredCounty
ForeignField.phrase: Incurred County|A combined field used to track and associate counties

RemoteField.name: IncurredCity
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred City|City where the loss occurred

RemoteField.name: IncurredPostalCode
RemoteField.phrase: Incurred Postal Code|Postal code used to direct mail to the physical street address where the loss occurred

RemoteField.name: LossStatusTypeID
RemoteField.phrase: Loss Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LossStatusCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Loss Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

CodeField.name: LossStatusCategory
CodeField.phrase: Loss Status Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar categories of loss status types

ForeignField.name: LossStatusType
ForeignField.phrase: Loss Status Type|A combined field used to describe this loss status type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: GeneralLossStatusDescription
ForeignField.phrase: General Status Description|A detailed description of the loss status type
ForeignField.sample: Claims of loss that are open and the claimant is actively seeking treatment and/or engaging the adjuster towards a resolution

RemoteField.name: SpecificLossStatusDescription
RemoteField.phrase: Specific Status Description|A detailed description of the status of the specific claim of loss
RemoteField.sample: The settlement offer is under consideration by the claimant. We offer a settlement every six months and the claimant has indicated a desire to settle the claim this time.

SummaryField.name: ClaimCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Claim Costs|The total estimated amount of the cost to manage and mitigate claims related to this incident

SummaryField.name: RollupCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Rollup Costs|The total estimated amount of the cost to manage and mitigate claims related to this incident

SummaryField.name: LocalCosts
SummaryField.phrase: Local Costs|The estimated amount of costs attached directly to this record

CalculatedField.name: TotalCost
CalculatedField.phrase: Total Cost|The automatically calculated cost associated with this incident. Costs are derived by compiling all claim costs and those costs associated with managing this incident and tracked within the Costs module

RangeField.name: CostSeverityID
RangeField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

ForeignField.name: CostSeverityValue
ForeignField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

ForeignField.name: CostSeverity
ForeignField.phrase: Cost Severity|An automatically calculated severity category, based on the threshold values for Severity

RemoteField.name: CachedTotalCost
RemoteField.phrase: Total Cost|The total cost of this incident

RemoteField.name: CachedSeverityValue
RemoteField.phrase: Cost Severity|The severity this incident

CalculatedField.name: CalculatedSeverityValue
CalculatedField.phrase: Calculated Severity Value|The greater of the User-assigned severity value and the acutomaticlly assigned Cost Severity value

RemoteField.name: LikelihoodID
RemoteField.phrase: Risk Likelihood|A description of the risk likelihood based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Likelihoods module

ForeignField.name: LikelihoodValue
ForeignField.phrase: Likelihood Value|A numerical value assigned to the likelihood of risk occurrence. The likelihood value is used in combination with the severity value to calculate a risk index score and an associated recommendation to mitigate the risk

ForeignField.name: RiskLikelihoodTerm
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Likelihood Term|A one word description of the risk likelihood level

ForeignField.name: Likelihood
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Likelihood|A description of the risk likelihood based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Likelihoods module

RemoteField.name: LikelihoodStatusID
RemoteField.phrase: Likelihood Status|The present status of efforts to resolve the likelihood that this risk will occur, continue, or repeat

CodeField.name: LikelihoodStatus
CodeField.phrase: Likelihood Status|The present status of efforts to resolve the likelihood that this risk will occur, continue, or repeat

RemoteField.name: LikelihoodFactors
RemoteField.phrase: Likelihood Factors|A detailed description of the factors affecting the likelihood that this risk will occur, continue, or repeat
RemoteField.sample: SCBAs were purchased for all First Responders and all responders have been trained by the Fire Department

RemoteField.name: SeverityID
RemoteField.phrase: Risk Severity|A description of the risk severity based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Severities module

ForeignField.name: SeverityValue
ForeignField.phrase: Severity Value|A numerical value assigned to the severity of risk or loss. The severity value is used in combination with the likelihood value to calculate a risk index score and an associated recommendation to mitigate the risk of loss

ForeignField.name: RiskSeverityTerm
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Severity Term|A one word description of the risk severity level

ForeignField.name: Severity
ForeignField.phrase: Risk Severity|A description of the risk severity based on a combination of field values assigned from within the Risk Severities module
ForeignField.sample: SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00

CalculatedField.name: IndexValue
CalculatedField.phrase: Index Value|A calculated field based on the risk likelihood and risk severity. The resulting risk index value is compared against the assigned risk index recommendations entered into the Risk Index module and the respective recommendation is displayed

RangeField.name: RiskRecommendation
RangeField.phrase: Recommended Action|An automatically assigned recommendation, based on the values assigned for Likelihood and Severity
RangeField.sample: Take action if and when appropriate

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: LossEmpPractice
CombinedField.phrase: Loss Employment Practice|A combined field used to describe this employment practice loss when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Jane Doe; Active Agenda, HQ; Packaging Area; 02-22-2004

SampleItem.name: Both On and Off Company Property
LOW: Possible but unlikely to occur
PROBABLE: Very likely to occur in immediate future
SLIGHT: Minor First Aid Injury; 900.00 to 9,000.00
SERIOUS: Serious injury or illness; 9001.00 to 90,000.00
SEVERE: Death or disabling injury; 90,001.00 to 900,000.00
CATASTROPHIC: Deaths and/or disabling injuries; 900,001.00 to 1,000,000.00
General Liability; Chubb; GL-19928-2003; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2003, 03-02-2004
General Liability; Zurich; GL-193-03; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2002, 03-02-2003
General Liability; AIG; GL-39-2003; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2001, 03-02-2002
General Liability; Fireman's Fund; GL-2003-837; Active Agenda, HQ; 03-02-2000, 03-02-2001

SERIOUS: Serious injury or illness; 9001.00 to 90,000.00

EditScreen.name: Subjects
EditScreen.phrase: Subjects|Associate subjects of with the the employment practice loss

EditScreen.name: EventLog
EditScreen.phrase: Events|Associate ongoing events with the employment practice loss

EditScreen.name: Documentation
EditScreen.phrase: Documentation|Track the status of documentation delivery requirements associated with the employment practice loss

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities for the employment practice loss

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the employment practice loss

EditScreen.phrase: Files|Associate file retention methods with the employment practice loss

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
